quests.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your first objective is to make an attempt to travel east. And then, ensure that the portmanteau is open. Then, take the passkey from the portmanteau inside the bar. With the passkey, check that the box is unlocked with the passkey. And then, ensure that the box inside the bar is open. And then, pick up the Microsoft style passkey from the box. After getting the Microsoft style passkey, insert the Microsoft style passkey into the Microsoft style chest within the bar's lock to unlock it. And then, ensure that the Microsoft style chest in the bar is open. After that, take the tv from the Microsoft style chest. After that, insert the tv inside the box. That's it!
commands: take Microsoft style passkey from box
unlock Microsoft style chest with Microsoft style passkey
take tv from Microsoft style chest
take Microsoft style passkey from box
unlock Microsoft style chest with Microsoft style passkey
take tv from Microsoft style chest

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just fallen into a bar.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a box.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] Oh, great. Here's a Microsoft style chest.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The Microsoft style chest contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The Microsoft style chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You make out a portmanteau. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The portmanteau is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a garage. A typical one. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You can see a stand. The stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the stand you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

 There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. There is an unblocked exit to the east.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You arrive in a workshop. A standard kind of place.

 You see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] normal looking suitcase in the corner.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_3]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You have come into the most usual of all possible restrooms.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a chest. Now why would someone leave that there?[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookery. An ordinary one. Let's see what's in here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a washroom.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You're now in the bathroom.

 You see a table. The table is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the table you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. You move on, clearly depressed by your TextWorld experience.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a kitchenette like it isn't some huge deal.

 You can make out a refrigerator.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_5]. Now why would someone leave that there?[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The refrigerator is empty![end if] You smell an awful smell, and follow it to a fridge. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! The fridge is empty![end if] You can make out a cabinet![if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_7]. Wow, check out the price tag that hangs off the cabinet! Thirty dollars![end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a board. The board is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the board you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the salon. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You see a bed. [if there is something on the s_3]On the bed you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]The bed appears to be empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You arrive in a sauna. A typical kind of place.



 There is [if d_8 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:

 There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedchamber. A normal one.



 There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden hatch leading north. There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling an office.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cedar passageway leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You are in a cellar. An usual one.

 You make out [if c_8 is locked]a locked[else if c_8 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] display.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The display contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_9 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden hatch leading south. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cedar portal leading west. There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading north.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You are in a spare room. An usual kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You see a crate.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cedar portal leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cedar gateway leading north. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cedar passageway leading south.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You arrive in a laundromat. An usual kind of place.

 You make out [if c_10 is locked]a locked[else if c_10 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] dresser.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] [if c_11 is locked]A locked[else if c_11 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] locker is close by.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_11]. Is this what you came to TextWorld for? This... locker?[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a playroom.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a shelf. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] You can make out a bookshelf. [if there is something on the s_5]On the bookshelf you make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]However, the bookshelf, like an empty bookshelf, has nothing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the shower. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

 You can see a trunk.[if c_12 is open and there is something in the c_12] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_12].[end if][if c_12 is open and the c_12 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

walkthrough: take Microsoft style passkey from box
unlock Microsoft style chest with Microsoft style passkey
take tv from Microsoft style chest

objective: Welcome to another life changing round of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, go to the east. With that done, look and see that the portmanteau is opened. Then, take the passkey from the portmanteau. And then, make it so that the box within the bar is unlocked. Then, ensure that the box is open. After opening the box, take the Microsoft style passkey from the box within the bar. With the Microsoft style passkey, insert the Microsoft style passkey into the Microsoft style chest's lock to unlock it. After that, assure that the Microsoft style chest is ajar. Then, take the tv from the Microsoft style chest. Then, you can put the tv into the box inside the bar. And if you do that, you're the winner!
